text:
Obscene.

This is a public health emergency. 

Not a business opportunity for shoddy private healthcare chums to profiteer from distress. 

It’s time to take back these beds for the NHS. Rent-free.

#COVIDー19 #Marr #Ridge

https://t.co/92WOOpary5
